properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 4:15AM MST until January 14 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Southwest Wyoming.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions including along
Interstate 80.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may cause low visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of
Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING
